Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
This class contains the methods that can be done by the game in order to validate token positions and to advance the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameBoard()
    Constructs a GameBoard that is a size of 9x7 and contains blank spaces for each position in the 9x7
